entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
